sentences.sentence: Russian cosmonauts handled major breakdowns on the station, which was wearing out.
sentences.translation: 后来，俄罗斯宇航员在空间站遇到重大故障，空间站报废。

sentences.sentence: The thrillionaire wannabe-cosmonauts haven't been invited. But they show up anyway.
sentences.translation: 将成为宇航员的“激动富翁”没收到邀请，但他们也出席了。

sentences.sentence: Russian cosmonauts also flew a new Soyuz spacecraft to the station every six months.
sentences.translation: 俄罗斯宇航员乘坐的新联盟号飞船每半年访问一次空间站。
